div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 386px; height: 1px; padding-top: 765px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

ol.li: We define the .Rds filename for storing, replacing .TXT with .rds
The name is printed to show the progression
The first line of the txt is separated by $ and saved to cn
The txt is imported skipping the first line and separating by $
The formatted data is saved as a .rds in the folder of origin.
Close all open connections with files

switch.text: We define the .Rds filename for storing, replacing .TXT with .rd...

ul.li: In DRUG2011Q2there was a missing newline at line 322966
In DRUG2011Q3there was a missing newline at line 247895
In DRUG2011Q4there was a missing newline at line 446737
